meta_fields.name: Product Badges (Simple)
meta_fields.description: Add multiple badges with text and colors. Format: Badge Text|Background Color|Text Color (one per line). Example: New Arrival|#00C851|#FFFFFF

meta_fields.name: Collection Badges (Simple)
meta_fields.description: Add multiple badges for all products in this collection. Format: Badge Text|Background Color|Text Color (one per line). Example: New Collection|#00C851|#FFFFFF
